duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead system architecture and guide cost evaluations for engineering activities.
Drive end-to-end engineering activities and define product scope collaboratively.
Validate subsystem implementation and steer technical progress across the product lifecycle.
Take ownership of system/sub-system requirements and critical design choices.
Translate feature needs into technical prerequisites suitable for engineering teams.
Serve as the primary technical interface for both external and internal communication during product design.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree PreferredAt least 3 years of experience Experience using Python, MATLAB/Simulink, and Stateflow Communicate Design Tradeoffs
